backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling contact submissions, appointment requests, admin-only domain drafts, and decommission mode with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing autogenerated one-line summaries for all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting metadata, favicons, and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and referencing the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all site routes including doctor-suites with priorities and changefreq.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages including doctor suites, wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: React form component handling appointment request input, validation, and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form component handling contact submission with validation, success/error states, and integration with useSubmitContact.
Page hero section that displays a title, subtitle, optional badge, and visual variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Generic layout section wrapper supporting default and muted background variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, contact details, and hours using centralized config values.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, emergency contact bar, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main site layout combining header, footer, SEO manager, and a skip-to-content link.
frontend/src/components/seo/Organization: Injects JSON-LD markup describing the medical organization for search engines.
frontend/src/components/seo/SeoManager.t: Dynamically updates document head tags for SEO based on current route.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines the hospital name and helper for composing page titles.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Centralized contact details with helpers for emergency and phone tel links.
frontend/src/config/seo.ts: Site-wide SEO configuration including base URL, route metadata, and helpers for titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via react-query, reinitializing it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Defines a mutation hook that submits appointment requests through the backend actor with normalized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit contact form data via the backend actor with user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with extensive theme variables for light and dark modes and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero banner, mission/vision cards, and core values grid.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Renders the appointment request page with steps overview and a form for submitting appointment requests.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, emergency details, and a contact form within a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Displays a notice that the site is decommissioned and updates the page title accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Lists doctor suites with details like specialties, availability, and navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Renders emergency services information, hero section, and service cards with contact actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, emergency contact links, navigation actions, and promotional content.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with messaging and a button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services overview with a hero section and grid of medical service cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom color tokens, spacing, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, including features for a Doctor Suites page, deployment notes, known issues, and pending content update requests.
